title: Voodoo hypnosis with Dr. Marco Paret/ Mesmerism & Fascination
description:
Dr. Paret and one of his students from his masterclass demonstrate a voodoo hypnosis. He is moving and touching an object and the subject is feeling every sensation. Non-verbal is deeper than the verbal and it allows us to connect immediately with our hidden emotions. After this hypnotic experience, the subject felt deeply transformed and happier. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
